title: 1 Month Rent Off! 2BR/2BA First class living in Downtown San Mateo
posting_body: ['Incredibly walkable, award-winning living at the Metropolitan in San Mateo.', 'Plan 2ER  2 \xa0bed / 2 bath / 1170 Sq.', 'Ft / From $4,684', '* Unit 115 - Available', 'Now', '* Unit 219 - Available 08/18/22', 'Metropolitan Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '338 South Fremont Street San Mateo, CA 94401', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x308', 'Property Description', 'Metropolitan has a two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment available that gives you an ideal social space within the grounds!', 'The home itself offers stylish finishes that include an Italian tile entry, a gas fireplace with limestone surrounds and mantel, and a private balcony with an additional storage space!', 'The kitchen in this home mixes the clean lines of stainless steel appliances with the earthy appeal of granite countertops.', 'A kitchen pantry gives you plenty of storage space.', 'Additional features include an in-home washer and dryer set, as well as a walk-in closet in the master bedroom.', 'When you want a breath of fresh air, meet up with your neighbors at the open-air lap pool and grill something on the barbecues!', 'Head indoors to take advantage of the clubhouse’s sixteen-seat movie theater, steam saunas, and chef’s kitchen!', 'Contact Metropolitan today to learn more about the latest pricing and availability!', 'Floor Plan Specials', '1 Month Free on Select Apartments', 'Floor Plan/Unit Features', '* Location - End/Corner Unit', '* Stainless steel appliances', '* Interior - Fireplace', '* Location - Close to Amenities', '* Location - Perimeter/Private', 'Property Amenities', '* ClubHouse', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* NightPatrol', '* OnSiteManagement', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* Availability24Hours', '* PackageReceiving', '* Recycling', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* Pool', '* Sundeck', '* WirelessInternet', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* Elevator', '* Gate', '* BusinessCenter', '* ConferenceRoom', '* Sauna', '* Spa', '*', 'Other', '* Garage', '* Transportation', '* TVLounge', '* JoggingWalkingTrails', '* GroceryService', 'Lease Terms:', 'Variable', 'Parking:', 'Type', '- Garage Lot', 'Fee', '- $40.00', 'Pet Policy:', 'Cat, Dog s are allowed.', 'We welcome up to 3 pets per household with a $200 per pet deposit and $65 per pet monthly pet rent.', 'Cats and dogs are welcomed without weight restrictions though certain breed restrictions apply.', 'Please call our leasing office for more details on our pet policy.', 'Year Built:', '2003', 'Remodeled:', '2014', 'Units:', '218', 'Office Hours', 'Monday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 6:00pm', 'Tuesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 6:00pm', 'Wednesday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 6:00pm', 'Thursday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 6:00pm', 'Friday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 6:00pm', 'Saturday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 5:00pm', 'Sunday', ':\u2002\u2002 9:00am to 1:00pm & 2:00pm to 5:00pm', 'Management Company:', 'Prometheus Real Estate Group, Inc.*', 'Call Us Today!', 'show contact info', 'x308', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
